thumb.title: [TAS] SNES Super Metroid Phazon by Hoandjzj in 35:11.67
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=phevHj1dbp8かなり昔にやった覚えがあります結構楽しかったです。10時間以上かかったはず・・・以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6467M TAS originally published on 2025-03-28Super Metroid Phazon is a Super Metroid ROM hack by Red M0nk3y. It features completely new rooms, enemies, items as well as custom graphics. It is also considered to be more accessible by the author.Hoandjzj (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/Hoandjzj) completes the ROM hack in record time.ハックロムのダウンロード先http://www.metroidconstruction.com/hack.php?id=33
thumb.last_res_body: メタリドリーは硬い なんかもうルート... どんだけ硬いねん... 味噌飛ばして酢味...
